reviewText: Richard Hatch (Battlestar Galactica - The Complete Epic Series, ABC 1978-1979) plays "Joe". he fought in Vietnam. He had a romance with a woman played by Jolina Mitchell-Collins (NBC serial, Days of Our Lives,"Jasmine" [1984-1985]). In the middle of a shoot-out he tries to save the children, but gets injured himself. He was immediately taken on the chopper. Now it is thirteen years later, and he goes back to Vietnam. He tries to find the woman he loved and get to know the son he's never seen. But an enemy awaits who wants to settle an old score. Joe's enemy in Vietnam, Binko, kidnaps him and takes him back to the jungle. When Joe escapes, it becomes a free-for-all. A manhunt. Joe must run for safety while the drug runners hunt him down. In the cast, Michael J. Pollard (Bonnie & Clyde [1967]), Dennis Patrick, Cameron Dye, Ron Max and Robert Walker. That actor you recognized as "Tucker" is actor, Mills Watson. The boy "Joseph" is played by J.C. Bernardo. Richard Hatch, the original cast member of Battlestar Galactica in 1978- 79 had a special guest star role in the new Battlestar Galactica - Season One tv series (2004-09) on the Sci-Fi Channel. Richard Hatch played "Tom Zarek".
